hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Engineering Precision Since 1993
hero.description: With three decades of manufacturing expertise, Momai Brass has been delivering high-precision components to critical industries worldwide. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives our continuous growth and technological advancement.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision components manufacturer with 30+ years experience, specializing in CNC machining for automotive, pneumatic, and hydraulic sectors.

items.content: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise, specializing in CNC-machined parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. Our commitment to quality, advanced technology, and customer satisfaction drives our continuous growth and industry leadership.
highlights: Precision Components in Brass, Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Copper

items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.description: Precise material sourcing and selection based on component requirements
